comments.body: This is minor, but could we make this `res0: Int = 3`? I think that would make it a bit more clear that `extract` pulls an `A` out of an `F` context. `Id` is the weird case where `Id[A]` and `A` happen to be the same.
Also we'll need to change `Id.pure` after #955. We could either do `val id: Id[Int] = 3` or we could do something like `Applicative[Id].pure(3)`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +24,28 @@    * scala> val id: Id[Int] = 3
    * scala> Comonad[Id].extract(id)
    * res0: cats.Id[Int] = 3
    * }}}
    */
